entity.name: Unsealed court documents allege Trump's involvement with hush money payments
entity.description: The documents from a federal probe allege that Trump and his jailed former lawyer Michael Cohen were in contact multiple times around the time of alleged hush money payments. It was also alleged that Hope Hicks was involved in a call at that time after denying her involvement in front of a House committee last month.

text:
@KatiePhang funny  Paul Manafort gets released for covid-19 fears ( friend of Trump)
BUT
Micheal Cohen who was scheduled to be released due to covid-19 has his release rescinded ( a Trump foe ?!!!)
JUST SAYING...
